column3:
Nice! This solves [at least part of] #4124.

Please also add a file to `doc/` that describes how to set up bitcoind as a service (so how to install this service file).
@aitorpazos Thanks for pushing this upstream to bitcoin instead of only to the @freicoin branch. \n
@laanwj You're right, I've just added doc related commits to this pull request. I almost forgot the actual instructions on how to install .service file :-S . @jtimon You're welcome.\n
ACK after squash into one commit.\n(ignore the pulltester error, the build system or source code isn't even touched)\n

Automatic sanity-testing: PASSED, see http://jenkins.bluematt.me/pull-tester/p4577_0c3e1019665edb6c456f9640307231863db2835f/ for binaries and test log.\nThis test script verifies pulls every time they are updated. It, however, dies sometimes and fails to test properly.  If you are waiting on a test, please check timestamps to verify that the test.log is moving at http://jenkins.bluematt.me/pull-te
